original_text: Only the trees that you know are not trees for food you may destroy and cut down, that you may build siegeworks against the city that makes war with you, until it falls.
korean_text: 다만 과목이 아닌 수목은 찍어내어 너희와 싸우는 그 성읍을 치는 기구를 만들어 그 성읍을 함락시킬 때까지 쓸지니라

sentences.original_text: Only the trees that you know are not trees for food
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 네가 먹는 과목이 아님을 아는 나무는

sentences.original_text: you may destroy and cut down
against the city that makes war with you
